title: Sweetcorn salad
ingredients: ['1 red pepper, seeds removed and diced', '1 green peppers, seeds removed and diced', '2 tins of sweetcorn', '2 tomatoes, diced', '225g salami or smoked sausage, diced', '1 tablespoon finely chopped onion', 'oil', 'vinegar', 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste']
